short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track your leads on whatsapp Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Introducing Whats app CRM, Don't waste time managing customers on whats app. Easily add tags, notes for your contacts.

We are building features to quickly add calendar invites, meets invites, and zoom invites to the chat.

It's a lightweight utility on Whatsapp Web that helps you organize your chats. You can add labels to the chats and organize them based on the labels for quick access. The extension runs offline and does not internet connection to work.
long.ca,de,es,fr,hi,id,it,ko,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,r:
Looking for a whale of a time while managing your customers on WhatsApp? Dive into the fun with WhatsUpCRM - your new BFF in the world of customer management! 🐳🎉

Welcome aboard the USS WhatsUpCRM, where our top-notch CRM Chrome extension turns managing WhatsApp clients into a non-stop party! Juggling customer relationships has never been this easy or uproarious. With our quirky, intuitive interface, you'll feel like you're playing the most enjoyable game of Tetris, but with clients instead of blocks. 🎮🕺

💬 Instantly sort, label, and categorize your contacts like a ninja with our high-speed, karate-chopping CRM features. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to organized euphoria! 🥋

📅 Our calendar is so smart, it could probably win Jeopardy! Seamlessly schedule appointments, set reminders, and never miss a beat with clients. You'll wonder how you ever lived without it! 🧠

📊 Analyze your customer interactions like a cool, undercover detective with our advanced reports and insights. Uncover hidden gems and make data-driven decisions that'll skyrocket your business to the moon and beyond! 🚀

🛠️ Customize our CRM to your heart's content with our easy-to-use, modular design. It's like building your own LEGO masterpiece but for your business! You'll be the envy of all your entrepreneur pals. 🏗️

🔒 Worried about security? Fear not! Our encryption is tighter than a hipster's skinny jeans. Your data is safe and sound with us, leaving you free to focus on what truly matters - your clients and your business. 🛡️

So, why wait? Give your WhatsApp a snazzy makeover and transform it into the ultimate CRM powerhouse with WhatsUpCRM! Install now, and let the good times roll! 🎊💼

Keywords: WhatsApp CRM, Chrome Extension, Customer Management, Fun CRM, CRM Party, WhatsApp Business, Client Organizer, Appointment Scheduler, Data Analysis, Customizable CRM, Secure CRM, Business Growth
